Reviews.Title: PHOTOBERT PHOTO CHEATSHEET FOR NIKON D700 NOT AN EASY READ.
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Shannon
Reviews.Content: Compared with a previous PhotoBert CheatSheet I purchased (PhotoBert Photography Course On A Card), this product is very difficult to read.The printing is smaller and spacing is compressed.  Rather than using a plain white background against whichthe black printing contrasts, this product utilizes various shades of color background, thus reducing thecontrast between the print and the background.  Unless one has the visual acuity of a Wall Street lawyer used to reading very fine print, I would caution against buying this product.The  information presented regarding the Nikon D700 digital SLR camera is excellent, but what good is itif it can't be readily seen?

Reviews.Title: Review of a Nikon D700 condensed instruction sheet
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Brewer "Brewerdvm"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product, it does more than what is was touted to do. It took a very complex item and has reduced the instuctions to make you more efficient and enjoy the use of a fine advanced digital camera system.  It is concise for the amount of information provided, easily read and logical.  It is a wonder.

ProductInfo.Features:
Laminated for long life
Folds to fit in camera bag, pocket or purse.
Color coded for quick reference
All the important details in one place.
ProductInfo.Name: PhotoBert Photo CheatSheet for Nikon D700 Digital SLR Camera
